resources.string: This message and any attachments(hereafter the e-mail) contains confidential information or information belonging to the senderand is intended solely for the addressee(s) The unauthorised disclosure, use, dissemination or copying (either whole or partial) of this e-mail, or any information it contains, is prohibited. E-mailsare susceptible to alteration and their integrity cannot be guaranteed. The sender shall not be liable for this e-mail if modified or falsified. If you are not the intended recipient of this e-mail, please delete it immediately and permanently from your system and notify the sender of the wrong delivery and the mail deletion

I provide my consent for the same and kindly request you to grant permission to my ward.
Contact no 8457885677
Thanking you
Mother of Ipsita Barua

Respected Sir.
I, Ipsita Barua(UCSE20041), would request you to kindly grant me permission to leave the residence on February 14th for buying essentials. I hereby confirm that I will not be missing any classes during my absence.
Date of leaving- 14th February
Time of leaving- 4 pm 
Date of arriving- 14th February 
Time of arriving- 9 pm
Thank you. Yours sincerely
